Lecture.Description:
Elements are added and removed in a specific order. - LinkedList is a list and double ended queue. It implements Link and Queue. - ArrayDeque is pure double ended queue.
Queue methods: - boolean add(E e) - throws ex - E element() - returns next element - throws ex - boolean offer(E e) - adds element to the end - E remove() - throws ex - void push() - adds to the front - E poll() - removes and returns next element - E peek() - returns next element
Stack methods: - void push() - E peek() - E pop() - removes and returns next element - throws ex
